TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LowerCaseStringConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter
Public NotInheritable Class LowerCaseStringConverter Inherits TypeConverter
public ref class LowerCaseStringConverter sealed : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供將物件轉換為小寫字串的支援。

span.span: Provides support to convert an object to a lowercase string.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別，允許物件轉換成小寫的字串。The class allows an object to be converted to a lowercase string. 這個類別也提供支援，以確認該物件類型可以轉換成小寫的字串之前進行轉換。This class also provides support to verify that an object type can be converted to a lowercase string before the conversion is made. 方法的做為參數取得該物件會實作介面。The methods of take as a parameter an object that implements the interface. 這個介面會提供元件的相關內容資訊。This interface provides contextual information about a component. 通常，這個介面是在設計階段用來提供設計階段容器的相關資訊。Typically, this interface is used at design time to provide information about a design-time container. 常用於類型轉換。The is commonly used in type conversion.

summary.span: 依據指定的參數將物件從其原始值轉換為小寫字串。

span.span: Converts an object from its original value to a lowercase string based on the specified parameters.
A lowercase string object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用該物件會實作介面做`ctx`參數。This method uses an object that implements the interface as the `ctx` parameter. 這個介面會提供元件的相關內容資訊。This interface provides contextual information about a component. 通常，這個介面是在設計階段用來提供設計階段容器的相關資訊。Typically, this interface is used at design time to provide information about a design-time container. 常用於類型轉換。The is commonly used in type conversion. `ci`參數物件提供的文化特性的相關資訊。The `ci` parameter object provides the culture-related information. `data`參數物件的方法完成之後做要轉換的物件和產生的物件。The `data` parameter object acts as both the object to convert and the resulting object once the method is complete. 是否需要自訂行為，請覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中。Override this method in a derived class if custom behavior is required. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用這個方法。The following example demonstrates how to use this method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.LowerCaseStringConverter#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.LowerCaseStringConverter/CS/LowerCaseStringConverter.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.LowerCaseStringConverter#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.LowerCaseStringConverter/VB/LowerCaseStringConverter.vb#5)]
